Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Well, you look a bit down in the dumps, today. You okay?

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Ah.. well.. *COUGH* It's nothing a bike ride can't fix! This must be your second week with me, right?

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Why not take a trip on the suburban paper route? The roads are a little rough...

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: But your helmet will keep you safe, I am sure! Your trailer might cause trouble, though...

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Either way, I've got 3 customers on that route.

Name: You
Text: Three?? I better be getting paid more for that!

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* Of course, of course, dear boy. Now, hop to it!

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* As I said, the roads are rough.. better take a few extras, just in case!
